name: public-cv-generator
description: Generates HTML resumes from JSON files.

scripts.build:en: cp resumes/en.json build/resume.json && resume export build/en.html --format html --theme jsonresume-theme-cora --resume resumes/en.json
scripts.build:fr: cp resumes/fr.json build/resume.json && resume export build/fr.html --format html --theme jsonresume-theme-cora --resume resumes/fr.json
